text:
If you are struggling with addiction, this is such a hopeful message to you. The burden you carry is heavy but there are others who will help carry you through the darkest of times. They’ve been where you are and they have overcome.
@anamariecox, I’m so grateful for your example.

text:
Elliott, your tweet contradicts itself. You say:
1/ My tweet is “untrue” that "Heller" did not constitutionally protect the AR-15. 
2/ You then attack "Heller" for not constitutionally protecting AR-15s. 
#TrumpWorld
author: JoeNBC

text: Boy, you got me there, Dan.
author: JoeNBC

text:
And here is the problem:
I share historic links from 40 years ago with clear evidence the AR-15 was developed as a military weapon and quote the Supreme Court decision that does not constitutionally protect AR-15s. And you call that “propaganda”. Read. Be better. Be best.
author: JoeNBC

text: I have literally been saying this for years. Maybe you were still in prep school at the time
author: JoeNBC

text: I’ve been saying this for years and also saying it was about his college application.
author: JoeNBC

text: Read the US Constitution and "Heller". If you read before tweeting, you will learn that the 2nd Amendment is not what you feel it should be. The 2nd Amendment is what the Supreme Court says it is.
author: JoeNBC

text:
INY 
We can never let others distract from the fact that at our best, we are still America the Beautiful
author: JoeNBC

text: As a longtime gun owner and supporter of the Second Amendment, I agreed with the Supreme Court’s "Heller" holding that concluded Americans had the right to keep and bear arms. But that constitutional protection did not, and will not, extend to guns designed as weapons of war.
author: JoeNBC

text: Here’s an article from 1981 explaining how the Pentagon’s failure to use the AR-15 in Vietnam cost American lives. The AR-15 was proven to be lighter & more lethal than the M-14 or M-16. It was designed exclusively by Eugene Stoner to kill people in war.
author: JoeNBC

text:
Those suggesting the AR-15 was NOT developed as a weapon of war should read up on history. The AR-15 was developed as a military weapon to replace the M-14. Eugene Stoner designed it to be lighter and more lethal than the M-14. 
It was far deadlier than the M-16 used in Vietnam.
author: JoeNBC

text: At the Vatican, Pope Francis in his traditional Sunday prayer led the faithful in a silent prayer “for our Muslim brothers who were killed” and renewed “an invitation to unite in prayer and gestures of peace to oppose hatred and violence.”

text: Since the collapse of the Soviet Union and the ideological battle between communism and capitalism ended, more than one billion people have escaped poverty.
author: JoeNBC

text:
Poverty has fallen worldwide to historically low rates, in large part, because of the spread of capitalism. As Alan Greenspan said, American capitalism is threatened by income inequality. Capitalism reform is necessary. 
Outright rejection is foolish.
author: JoeNBC

text: I’m so distressed. Whatever will I do?
author: JoeNBC

text: https://www.nytimes.com/2019/03/08/business/endeavor-saudi-arabia.html?smid=nytcore-ios-share … via @NYTimes
author: JoeNBC

text:
Stretching a little bit there, buddy. The story speaks for itself and is strong enough without you mischaracterizing things. Look at the segment. 
No distress there. Obvious. 
Seacrest Out.
author: JoeNBC

text: Also, if your definition of “distressed” is how I acted the next block, you are a sensitive snowflake my millennial friend.
author: JoeNBC

text: Alan Greenspan said income disparity is now the greatest threat to American capitalism. You can be a capitalist and still call for aggressive reforms. Democrats need to figure that out quickly unless they want to concede the election to Trump now.
author: JoeNBC

text: It was remarkable that he couldn’t say he was a capitalist who understood that capitalism has fed and freed more people than any economic system ever devised. Still, capitalism has required reforms throughout US history under TR, FDR and LBJ.
author: JoeNBC
